_source.short_desc: A complete Contract Lifecycle Management solution to automate, manage, draft, negotiate & control your contracts, documents & templates
_source.long_desc:
A complete Contract Lifecycle Management solution to manage and control contracts throughout the entire life cycle. 

App4Legal allows users to manage the processes of contract creation, drafting, approval, signature and execution to maximize collaboration and efficiency and to reduce the time spent during the end-to-end process. 

Automate the creation of Contracts on the fly from your own multi-language templates. Set access roles and permissions& Integrates with Digital Signature if needed.
_source.pricing_details:
On-Cloud / SaaS: $19 per user/month (billed annually) or $24/user/month (billed monthly)

Self-hosted (on-server) solution: Contact App4Legal for pricing information  

Additional options:

Outlook Connect - $10/user/month (billed monthly) or $8/user/month (billed monthly)

Google Connect -  $10/user/month (billed monthly) or $8/user/month (billed monthly)

Modules:

Client Portal - $28/user/month (unlimited customers)

Advisor Portal - $28/advisor/month
_source.target_audience:
- Law Firms in any practice & any jurisdictions
- In-House Legal Departments in any organization (enterprise)
- Any team dealing with contracts & Legal Matters

category_features.name: Buy Side (Suppliers)
category_features.definition: An agreement between a business and an external supplier for the delivery of a set of products or services

category_features.name: Completion Tracking
category_features.definition: Progress indicators towards activity completion

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.definition: Organize, track, and automate the entire contract process

category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.definition: An agreement that's only valid if signed by all involved parties, sealed, and delivered

category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

related_products.short_desc: Adobe Acrobat Sign helps teams manage contract lifecycles by reducing errors and manual work which saves them time and money.
related_products.features: Adobe Acrobat Sign helps teams manage contract lifecycles by reducing errors and manual work which saves them time and money. Acrobat Sign offers tools to assist with contract management like workflows to automate agreements, templates to reduce mistakes, and user group management for clean assignment and permissions. It integrates seamlessly with Workday, Salesforce, and Microsoft so employees can continue to work in systems they already use.

related_products.short_desc: Build, track, and eSign your docs all in one place using legally binding online signatures.
related_products.features: PandaDoc streamlines contract management from the sale all the way through contract execution and renewal. Built-in collaboration, version control, document history, and electronic signature make it easier than ever to draft, negotiate, and sign contracts.

related_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage contracts, clients, proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
related_products.features:
Contract management for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to manage contracts, book clients, streamline projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_products.short_desc: Save time recording bills, scanning contracts, and approving documents. Avoid risks, go paperless, and increase ROI with Odoo Sign.
related_products.features: Improve hiring processes, reduce sales cycles, and keep track of all contracts, with Odoo?s easy-to-use, fully integrated eSignature solution. Odoo Sign is a fast, convenient way to send, sign, and approve documents. Users can quickly prepare clean, polished contracts by simply dragging & dropping blocks to be completed by the parties involved, submit signature requests in just seconds, carefully track the status of sent contracts, and upload important PDF files with ease - thanks to Odoo Sign.

related_products.short_desc: Online ITSM Service Desk with Incident, Problem, Change, Release & Asset Management, in addition to powerful ticketing & automation
related_products.features: Freshservice is an intelligent, right-sized ITSM solution that delivers exceptional employee experiences with an intuitive, scalable, no-code solution. With its state-of-the-art AI and ML capabilities, Freshservice helps organizations ease an IT agents workload and improve their productivity by automating mundane tasks. In addition to its AI capabilities, Freshservice is flexible and scalable enough to be used by both: companies relying on legacy systems and modern enterprises.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Adobe? Acrobat? alternative: PDFelement is your all-in-one PDF solution. Create, edit, convert, and sign PDF files in a better way.
related_products.features:
PDFelement is the easiest way to create, edit, convert and sign PDF documents on Windows and Mac. This alternative to Adobe Acrobat offers enterprise-grade PDF functionalities and perpetual licensing. 

Sold globally in 9 different languages, PDFelement is the all-in-one PDF solution for users of all types, and the only complete PDF solution next to Adobe Acrobat available on Windows, Mac, iOS, & Android.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
related_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

related_products.short_desc: Proposify's the proposal software that gives you control and visibility into the most important stage of your sales process. The close.
related_products.features:
Proposify is the online proposal software that gives control and visibility into the most important stage of your sales process. From deal design to sign-off, get the confidence and flexibility to manage and close all your quotes, contracts, and proposals.

Create impressive sales documents that stay consistent and error-free. Receive the insights to scale your process, make timely engagements, and accurately forecast. And deliver a seamless sign-off experience for your customers and prospects.

related_products.short_desc: Quickbase is a secure, compliant and easily governed no-code platform that enables you to track/manage everything for your contracting.
related_products.features: Quickbase empowers enterprise organizations to quickly turn ideas into applications that make them more efficient, informed, and productive. Quickbase is a secure, compliant and easily governed platform that enables you to track and manage everything you need for your contracts. Gain transparency, improve the resiliency of your supply chain, make better decisions, and gain new levels of efficiency by unlocking data stuck in your core systems. Ensure ongoing agility with no-code applications.

related_products.short_desc: Concord is the simplest way to collaborate on, sign, manage, and store agreements.
related_products.features:
Concord is the only tool you need for all your contracts. Spend less time juggling between applications, editors, and e-signature tools and save money. 
Over 500,000+ companies trust Concord with their contracts. 
With Concord, you can: draft, negotiate, sign, and manage every contract across your organization  all in one place; work the way you want  on Concord, Word, or Google Docs; collaborate with everyone  your teams, customers, and vendors. Get started in minutes, not months.

related_products.short_desc: Web based software that empowers businesses to negotiate, create, track, sign, and manage contracts from any device.
related_products.features: Better Proposals is an intuitive, web based contract management solution. Streamline your entire sales process with modern, on-brand digital documents and automate contract generation. Say goodbye to using multiple platforms thanks to its integrations, tracking, analytics, and legally binding eSignatures.

similar_products.short_desc: ContractSafe helps companies to better organize signed contracts and avoid missing key dates without spending a lot of time or money.
similar_products.features: We organize your contracts easily and affordably!  Incredibly easy to use and manage.  Search and find any document (even scans) in seconds.  AI pulls key info for setup. Email reminders so you'll never forget to renew (or cancel) an important contract.  Collaborate with your whole team-with unlimited users.  No implementation or configuration means you will be up and running right away.  Find out why our customers call us "disruptive" and "a miracle product," and give us five star ratings!

similar_products.short_desc: User-friendly contract software with AI and easy setup. Pricing starts at $59/month/user. Thousands of users worldwide
similar_products.features: CobbleStone Contract Insight Contract Management Software is an Enterprise CLM system selected by thousands of contract admin, legal, and procurement professionals. Contract Insight is backed by artificial intelligence and can automate and streamline the entire contract lifecycle with user-friendly features and administration. Take the stress out of contracts with CobbleStone.  Hosted/SaaS & Deployed options. Starting @ $59/month/user, click to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: The most flexible, powerful contract platform to modernize the way you contract manage - from Drafting to Negotiating to Tracking.
similar_products.features: Want to generate contracts 75% faster? Outlaw is the most flexible, easiest-to-use contract management platform. While staying compliant, teams can turn a 5-step agreement process down to just 2. Ingest buy-side contracts, redlines and all, to keep all parties on the same page. Track and store documents in our intelligent contract repository. Draft, negotiate and eSign in real-time. Integrate Outlaw seamlessly with your existing workflow and business tools.

similar_products.short_desc: ContractWorks is easy-to-use contract management software with quick implementation, low, transparent pricing, and 24/7 support.
similar_products.features: ContractWorks contract management software makes executing, storing, and tracking corporate agreements easier. With quick implementation, an easy-to-use interface, and low, transparent pricing starting at $600/month for unlimited users, ContractWorks makes contract management software accessible to businesses of all sizes. In addition to these features, you get a dedicated support team to help your business get the most out of your contract portfolio.

similar_products.short_desc: Juro is the all-in-one contract automation platform that empowers legal and business teams to streamline contract workflow.
similar_products.features:
Juro is the all-in-one contract automation platform that empowers legal and business teams to create, approve, eSign, track and manage their contracts in one unified workspace. 

Spend less time working across multiple tools and enable your team to close contracts faster with self-serve automation, collaborative workflows and a data-rich repository.

5,000+ companies of all sizes use Juro to spend 75% less time on manual contract work and close contracts 30% faster.

similar_products.short_desc: A simple to use, powerful, cloud-based Contract Management Solution with AI & automation at its centre. Choose a better way today.
similar_products.features:
A simple to use, powerful, AI driven cloud-based Contract Management solution. Centralise contracts for increased visibility, automate & standardise internal processes, monitor risk & manage workload. 

Enjoy unlimited users, unlimited integrated electronic signatures & automation tools, including patent-pending Touchless Contracts technology. 

Say goodbye to Excel & other outdated software solutions- say hello to powerful, cost effective CLM that integrates with your existing tech-stack.

similar_products.short_desc: ContractNow is a simple, powerful contract management solution with unlimited users, storage & electronic signatures.
similar_products.features:
ContractNow is a simple, powerful contract management solution specifically designed to help businesses gain clarity and control over their contract agreements.

Centralise all your contract data and documentation, extract key information & clause language and sign all new contracts using ContractNow's integrated eSign feature.

Gain total visibility over your business's contracts and create a stable platform for future growth.

similar_products.short_desc: - #1 Leading No Code Platform - Automate and fast-track your entire contract lifecycle process from creation to amendment/renewal.
similar_products.features:
- #1 Leading No Code Platform - Automate and fast-track your entire contract lifecycle process by automating and streamlining the contract-creation process, from information gathering, negotiation, approvals, e-signature, and obligations.

Generate contracts in a matter of minutes and facilitate the negotiation & signing process with automated workflows & redlining functionality. Gain instant visibility into contract and approval statuses, and stay up to date with automated alerts.

similar_products.short_desc: Windward is a low-code document solution for MS Office users who want to streamline the creation and output of any data-based documents
similar_products.features: Windward is the global leader in document generation solutions. Our unique, low-code solution embeds into any application and enables users to design custom, logic-based templates within the familiar landscape of Microsoft Office. Windward is fast, easy, and removes human error, transforming the way business professionals create documents.

similar_products.short_desc: Icertis is the only contract intelligence platform you can trust to keep your business out in front, now and into the future.
similar_products.features: The AI-powered, analyst-validated Icertis Contract Intelligence (ICI) platform turns contracts from static documents into strategic advantage by structuring and connecting the critical contract information that defines how an organization runs. Today, the worlds most iconic brands and disruptive innovators trust Icertis to fully realize the intent of their combined 7.5 million+ contracts worth more than $1 trillion, in 40+ languages and 90+ countries.

similar_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
similar_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

similar_products.short_desc: Conga contracting products help automate and simplify contract management within your organization.
similar_products.features:
Conga empowers you to tackle and manage contracting processes with ease. If you're just dipping your toes into contracting or want to improve a mature contract management process, Conga has you covered. Our contract solutions help you automate key contracting processes to give your business faster cycle times, lower risk, and happier customers.

Conga provides proven contract management solutions that fit your business needs.

similar_products.short_desc: With over a decade of experience, our data-driven software provides an intuitive, powerful and flexible contract management experience.
similar_products.features: Contract Logix is a longtime leader and provider of intelligent and data-driven contract lifecycle management software. The company's software empowers legal, administration, IT, procurement, finance, and sales professionals across dozens of industries to digitally draft, negotiate, approve, execute, and manage their contracts. Hundreds of brands have partnered with Contract Logix to automate their contracting processes while minimizing risk, increasing compliance, and driving profitability.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Management software automates the process of managing documents from creation to storage to distribution throughout an enterprise, increasing efficiency and reducing the cost and clutter of maintaining paper records. Document Management applications provide solutions for a wide range of document needs from low specificity, high volume items such as standard forms to highly specific, low volume items such as one-to-one correspondence. Document Management software is related to Digital IT Asset Management software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Proposal Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Quoting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Quoting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Quoting software enables organizations to accurately calculate cost and price estimates quickly and efficiently. Quote Management applications also allow enterprise-wide distribution of quotes, enabling automatic pricing based on historical records as well as easy integration of localized factors, including customer profiles, case-specific terminology and sales tax rates. Many Quoting applications integrate directly with an organization's accounting activities, enabling the automatic conversion of price quotes to invoices. Quoting software is related to Accounting software and Sales Force Automation software.

pricing_plans.name: Basic (Cloud)
pricing_plans.description: This Basic (Cloud) plan is for legal practices that require a more basic solution for contract management, financial management, reports and more. The plan offers a free trial.

pricing_plans.name: Business (Cloud)
pricing_plans.description: This Business (Cloud) plan is for legal practices that require a more advanced tool for contract management, automated templates, data migration, reporting, financial management and more. The plan offers a free trial.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise (Cloud)
pricing_plans.description: This Enterprise (Cloud) plan is for legal practices that require unlimited document storage and professional everyday legal tools like financial management, contract management,  workflows, approvals and more. The plan offers a free trial.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise Plus (Cloud)
pricing_plans.description: This Enterprise Plus (Cloud) plan is a custom plan for legal practices that require a more tailored solution and support. Please contact company directly for custom quote.

pricing_plans.name: Business (Server)
pricing_plans.description: This Business (Server) plan is intended for legal practices that require an intuitive solution for case management, time & billing, task management and more. The plan offers a free trial.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise (Server)
pricing_plans.description: This Enterprise (Server) plan is intended for legal practices that require a more tailored solution for their everyday legal administrative responsibilities. Responsibilities like case management, contact & lead management, time & billing and more. The plan offers a free trial. Vendor must be contacted directly for custom quote.

_source.short_desc: A complete Document Automation solution to keep and organize all documents in one place where you can automate documents generation.
_source.long_desc:
A comprehensive Document Automation solution that keeps all documents, agreements, notes, and emails organized, categorized, indexed and searchable. Documents generation will be automated from your own templates available in multi-languages.

Documents can be organized by different criteria based on your preferences. Moreover, you can store and manage a wide range of legal templates. It supports version control where you can keep track of multiple variations of the same document.
_source.pricing_details:
On-Cloud / SaaS: $19 per user/month (billed annually) or $24/user/month (billed monthly)

Self-hosted (on-server) solution: Contact App4Legal for pricing information  

Additional options:

Outlook Connect - $10/user/month (billed monthly) or $8/user/month (billed monthly)

Google Connect -  $10/user/month (billed monthly) or $8/user/month (billed monthly)

Modules:

Client Portal - $28/user/month (unlimited customers)

Advisor Portal - $28/advisor/month
_source.target_audience:
- Law Firms in any practice & any jurisdictions
- In-House Legal Departments in any organization (enterprise)
- Any team dealing with contracts & Legal Matters

related_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS enables easy creation, centralizing, tracking, and automation of all document processes in your organization.
related_products.features: With monday.com Work OS you can create, store, and manage all documents and forms in one place. Automate document creation and approvals to increase efficiency and minimize error, share and collaborate on documents in real-time, and maximize security by centralizing them in one place. Track and review past edits through document search, and standardize document processes to keep everyone on your team on the same page. monday allows for efficient document management, in a collaborative workspace.

related_products.short_desc: Confluence can be your single source of truth. Use this tool to efficiently store and share information across your whole organization.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a collaboration software used for document management with visual proofing, real-time collaboration, and Kanban boards.
related_products.features: Wrike is a work management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Streamline your document management with cloud-based, in-context file storage. Share documents within custom request forms and tasks, shorten your approval cycles with visual proofing, and quickly tag teammates for any file requests. Accelerate your delivery with Wrike's 400+ integrations, including other document management software. Documents are easy-to-find and task discussions and updates can be seen in seconds.

related_products.short_desc: eFileCabinet's advanced workflow automation helps growing organizations limited by repetitive tasks maximize their revenue potential.
related_products.features: eFileCabinet is the ultimate document management solution that empowers HR, Finance, and more to focus on business outcomes. Our cloud-based solution can automate complex document processes that prevent midsize organizations from maximizing their revenue potential. eFileCabinet provides a secure, centralized location for each department to access their confidential data and reduce interdepartmental silos. Streamline your day with eFileCabinet and give 100% of focus to the work that matters.

related_products.short_desc: Sales teams use PandaDoc to improve deal workflow, insights, and speed while delivering an amazing buying experience.
related_products.features:
PandaDoc has empowered sales teams to improve deal workflow, insights, and speed while delivering an amazing buying experience.

Over 40,000 customers use PandaDocs all-in-one document automation software to streamline the process to create, approve, and eSign proposals, quotes, and contracts.  PandaDoc helps you simplify processes and increase efficiency across the entire organization when you integrate your existing CRM, payment, and file storage apps into a single workflow.

related_products.short_desc: Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams.
related_products.features:
Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams. We help teams share their core processes, then transform them into powerful no-code workflows.

Start with employee onboarding to set up new hires for success, then build all sorts of workflows like employee onboarding, client onboarding, and tenant screening.

Manage your team wiki and company handbook 100% free.

Join Salesforce, Colliers, Drift, and 3,000+ other businesses who use Process Street today.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is a free document management platform used by over 8 million businesses worldwide. Available in cloud and on-premise.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is a free document management platform used by over 8 million businesses worldwide. Available in cloud and on-premise (open source code access). Personal, group and company drive, file sync, file sharing, mobile access, online and offline document editing, multiuser editing, more.

similar_products.short_desc: DocuPhase simplifies document scanning, storage, retrieval, and archival processes for small to enterprise organizations.
similar_products.features:
DocuPhase's document management solution is ideal for organizations of all sizes, from small to enterprise organizations.

DocuPhase simplifies document scanning, storage, retrieval, and archival processes and is highly configurable to create the ideal solution for your company's unique needs. 

Eliminate repetitive tasks, digitize your archival and retrieval processes, and eliminate manual tasks that often involve time-consuming bottlenecks and paper shuffling.

similar_products.features: eFileCabinet is the ultimate document management solution that empowers HR, Finance, and more to focus on business outcomes. Our cloud-based solution can automate complex document processes that prevent midsize organizations from maximizing their revenue potential. eFileCabinet provides a secure, centralized location for each department to access their confidential data and reduce interdepartmental silos. Streamline your day with eFileCabinet and give 100% of focus to the work that matters.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage, share, and collaborate on business files. Offers granular control of data, role-based permissions and mobile access.
similar_products.features: Onehub is the best way to manage, share and collaborate on business files. Designed for business needs, Onehub offers granular control of data, role-based permissions and mobile access. The Onehub platform is intuitive and easy to use, so customers can begin controlled sharing of documents in minutes. Onehub's proven solution is used by more than one million users worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Engineering content management solution that enables flexible revision management and workflow support for projects & single documents.
similar_products.features: Engineering content management solution that enables flexible revision management and workflow support for projects & single documents.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho WorkDrive is secure document management software empowering modern teams to store, edit, share, and manage documents from a centra
similar_products.features: Create a central team workspace and cloud library for your entire organization with Zoho WorkDrive. Assign role-based access to your team members and enable them to store, share, and collaborate on documents securely. WorkDrive's modern interface offers a built-in office suite and advanced data security and management capabilities.

similar_products.short_desc: Conga's document generation software ensures creation, delivery, and storage of documents, driving revenue success and growth.
similar_products.features:
Conga document generation solutions are the go-to for creating beautiful, accurate digital documents using pre-built or customized templates auto-populated with data from Salesforce. Send consistent and personalized documents that elevate your brand and delight your customers.

No matter your industry, your role, or your use case, Conga document generation makes it easy to quickly generate error-free documents and automate processes. Get rid of process roadblocks to accelerate business revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management for accountants with expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.
similar_products.features: Time and billing software that offers expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.

similar_products.short_desc: A secure digital environment where your business-critical documents live, and your important processes can be optimized & automated.
similar_products.features:
ICM's ViewCenter is a secure digital environment where your business-critical documents live, and your important processes can be optimized. Get a quick ROI with powerful search functions, secure file sharing, compliance, tasks & alerts, electronic forms, scanning/data capture, integrations, and so much more.

Whether a small business or large corporation, ViewCenter is cost-effective and scalable...ICM's Customer Success Team will find the right solution for YOUR digital transformation goals.

similar_products.short_desc: OM Plus Delivery Manager is an advanced, intelligent print spooler management software.
similar_products.features: OM Plus Delivery Manager is an advanced, intelligent print management software. Delivery Manager seamlessly ingests jobs from multiple systems and delivers them to printers, multi-function devices, fax software, email systems, and more. Rarely changes are needed to existing ERP/EMR systems. OM Plus print spooler management software features include print confirmation, re-printing, re-routing, automated failover, load balancing, bundling, re-sequencing, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: SimpleFile is a mobile-app software solution that enables attorneys and clients to communicate better, review files faster, and more.
similar_products.features: SimpleFile simplifies the attorney, client relationship. It's the first-of-its-kind mobile app for attorneys and legal professionals to use with their clients. It simplifies communication and helps you manage your cases from anywhere. It's the fastest, most effective way to inform your clients of their case status, files, updates and more. You'll never have to chase down client emails, text messages or take unnecessary calls. Everything is right in the app.

similar_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS enables easy creation, centralizing, tracking, and automation of all document processes in your organization.
similar_products.features: With monday.com Work OS you can create, store, and manage all documents and forms in one place. Automate document creation and approvals to increase efficiency and minimize error, share and collaborate on documents in real-time, and maximize security by centralizing them in one place. Track and review past edits through document search, and standardize document processes to keep everyone on your team on the same page. monday allows for efficient document management, in a collaborative workspace.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on document management for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.
similar_products.features: HighQ's modern, adaptable, and continuously-learning legal workflow platform delivers an open and scalable foundation, embedded machine intelligence and analytics, and smart integration points with firm-critical applications. Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: A small-business digital filing system to store, find, & manage digital documents, with the best multi-document scanning for the price.
similar_products.features: DigitalDrawer is Windows-based, on-premise, small-business (3-5 users) digital filing software used in various industries, such as retail, manufacturing, realty, finance, education, etc. Businesses use it to electronically and securely store, organize, find, and manage documents. Customers choose DigitalDrawer to keep documents in-house and because of its low price tag, the best Multi-Document Scanning/Importing for the price, robust security, and a full array of document management functions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Digital Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Asset Management software automates the management of images and other non-textual materials. Digital Asset Management applications enable powerful, flexible solutions for developing, organizing, and distributing digital assets across multiple office locations and business sectors. These solutions ensure optimal usage for an organization's rich media assets such as advertising pieces, product images, sales collateral, audio, and video files. Digital Asset Management software is related to Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Entity Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Entity Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Entity Management software and related services enable organizations to maintain a searchable and easily accessible repository of records of one or more legal formations under their control.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Asset Management software provides enterprise wide inventory and life cycle management of software and hardware assets. This can include asset maintenance history, user permissions, acquisition budget forecasting, and software license compliance. This type of software enables IT managers to improve cost control and accurately track IT's business value throughout the organization. IT Asset Management software is related to Compliance software, License Management software, and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Knowledge Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Knowledge Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Knowledge Management software offers ways to optimize the utility of intellectual capital and intangible assets by capturing, preserving and organizing institutional knowledge in a measurable format. Knowledge Management solutions allow successful strategies to be transferred and replicated throughout an organization. Implementation can be inwardly focused on faster learning, new knowledge creation, and innovation or directed outwardly, providing a self-guided service path for customers. Knowledge Management software is related to Business Intelligence software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Proposal Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.

pricing_plans.name: Basic (Cloud)
pricing_plans.description: This Basic (Cloud) plan is for legal practices that require a more basic solution for contract management, financial management, reports and more. The plan offers a free trial.

pricing_plans.name: Business (Cloud)
pricing_plans.description: This Business (Cloud) plan is for legal practices that require a more advanced tool for contract management, automated templates, data migration, reporting, financial management and more. The plan offers a free trial.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise (Cloud)
pricing_plans.description: This Enterprise (Cloud) plan is for legal practices that require unlimited document storage and professional everyday legal tools like financial management, contract management,  workflows, approvals and more. The plan offers a free trial.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise Plus (Cloud)
pricing_plans.description: This Enterprise Plus (Cloud) plan is a custom plan for legal practices that require a more tailored solution and support. Please contact company directly for custom quote.

pricing_plans.name: Business (Server)
pricing_plans.description: This Business (Server) plan is intended for legal practices that require an intuitive solution for case management, time & billing, task management and more. The plan offers a free trial.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise (Server)
pricing_plans.description: This Enterprise (Server) plan is intended for legal practices that require a more tailored solution for their everyday legal administrative responsibilities. Responsibilities like case management, contact & lead management, time & billing and more. The plan offers a free trial. Vendor must be contacted directly for custom quote.
